pullrequest.title: Allow multiple contact sensors per link (#960)

content.html:
Here's the diff of what we originally changed, it seemed to work when I tested it. (I thought I had emailed this to you, but maybe it got lost)

diff -r 04e07b269d1c gazebo/sensors/ContactSensor.cc
--- a/gazebo/sensors/ContactSensor.cc   Mon Dec 15 17:04:04 2014 +0100
+++ b/gazebo/sensors/ContactSensor.cc   Mon Feb 02 14:29:01 2015 -0800
@@ -112,7 +112,7 @@
     // this sensor
     physics::ContactManager *mgr =
         this->world->GetPhysicsEngine()->GetContactManager();
-    std::string topic = mgr->CreateFilter(entityName, this->collisions);
+    std::string topic = mgr->CreateFilter(this->GetScopedName(), this->collisions);
     if (!this->contactSub)
     {
       this->contactSub = this->node->Subscribe(topic,
